GK19bicaupau:0: ANALYTIC VERSION according to BHELA conventions:
GK19bicaupau:7: PADA MARKERS For a four-pada verse:
GK19bicaupau:11: supto1tthitāṃ madana-vihvala-lālasā1ṅgīṃ % vidyāṃ pramāda-guṇitām iva cintayāmi // BiCaup_1
GK19bicaupau:12: adyā7pi tāṃ śaśi-mukhīṃ nava-yauvanā3ḍhyāṃ $ pīna-stanīṃ punar ahaṃ yadi
GK19bicaupau:16: adyā7pi tāṃ yadi punaḥ kamalā3yatā1kṣīṃ $ paśyāmi
GK19bicaupau:18: saṃpīḍya bāḥu-yugalena pibāmi vaktram % unmatta-van madhukaraḥ kamalaṃ yathe9ṣṭam // BiCaup_3
GK19bicaupau:25: adyā7pi tāṃ yadi punaḥ śravaṇā3yatā1kṣīṃ $ paśyāmi
GK19bicaupau:26: aṅgair ahaṃ samupaguhya tato 'tigāḍhaṃ % no7nmīlayāmi nayane na ca tāṃ tyajāmi // BiCaup_6
GK19bicaupau:32: adyā7pi tāṃ nidhuvane madhu-pāna-raktām $ līlā2dharāṃ kṛśa-tanuṃ
GK19bicaupau:37: adyā7pi tan-manasi saṃparivartate me $ rātrau mayi kṣutavati
GK19bicaupau:39: jīveti maṅgala-vacaḥ parihṛtya kopāt % karṇe kṛtaṃ kanaka-patram
GK19bicaupau:50: adyā7pi tat+kanaka-reṇu-ghano3ru-deśe $ nyastaṃ smarāmi nakhara-kṣata-lakṣma tasyāḥ &
GK19bicaupau:51: ākṛṣṭa-hema-rucirā1mbaram utthitāyā % lajjā-vaśāt kara-ghṛtaṃ ca tato vrajantyāḥ // BiCaup_15
GK19bicaupau:65: tat+keli-mandara-girau kusumā3yudhasya % kāntāṃ smarāmi ruciro1jjvala-puṣpa-ketum // BiCaup_20
GK19bicaupau:66: adyā7pi tāṃ cāṭu-śata-durlalito1citā1rthaṃ $ tasyāḥ smarāmi surata-klama-vihvalāyāḥ &
GK19bicaupau:73: paśyāmy ahaṃ yadi punar divasā1vasāne % svargā1pavarga-nara-rāja-sukhaṃ
GK19bicaupau:78: bālām anātha-śaraṇām anukampanīyāṃ % prāṇādhikāṃ kṣaṇam ahaṃ na hi vismarāmi // BiCaup_25
GK19bicaupau:80: haṃhojanā mama viyoga-hutā1śano 'yaṃ % soḍhuṃ na śakyate7ti praticintayāmi
GK19bicaupau:81: adyā7pi vismaya-karīṃ tridaśān vihāya $ buddhir balāc calati me kim ahaṃ
GK19bicaupau:83: jānann api pratimuhūrtam ihā7nta-kāle % kānte9ti vallabhatare9ti mame7ti
GK19bicaupau:85: adyā7pi tāṃ gamanam ity uditaṃ madīyaṃ $ śrutvai9va bhīru-hariṇīm iva
GK19bicaupau:88: adyā7pi tāṃ sunipuṇaṃ yatatā mayā9pi $ dṛṣṭaṃ na yat sadṛśato-vadanaṃ
GK19bicaupau:91: adyā7pi tāṃ kṣaṇa-viyoga-viṣo1pameyāṃ $ saṅge punar bahutarām
GK19bicaupau:96: kiṃ kiṃ tayā bahuvidhaṃ na kṛtaṃ mad-arthe % vaktuṃ na pāryate7ti vyathate mano me // BiCaup_31
GK19bicaupau:97: adyā7pi me niśi divā hṛdayaṃ dunoti $ pūrṇe1ndu-sundara-mukhaṃ mama vallabhāyāḥ &
GK19bicaupau:98: lāvaṇya-nirjita-rati-kṣati-kāma-darpaṃ % bhūyaḥ puraḥ pratipadaṃ na vilokyate yat // BiCaup_32
GK19bicaupau:99: adyā7pi tām avahitāṃ manasā9calena $ saṃcintayāmi yuvatīṃ mama jīvitā3śām
GK19bicaupau:104: līlā2vadhūtakara-pallava-kaṅkaṇānāṃ % kvāṇo vimūrcchati manaḥ sutarāṃ madīyam // BiCaup_34
GK19bicaupau:105: adyā7pi tāṃ nakha-padaṃ stana-maṇḍale yad dattaṃ $
GK19bicaupau:106: udbhinna-roma-pulakair bahubhiḥ samantāj % jāgarti rakṣati vilokayati
GK19bicaupau:108: adyā7pi kopa-vimukhī-kṛta-gantu-kāmā $ no7ktaṃ vacaḥ pratidadāti yadai9va
GK19bicaupau:110: cumbāmi roditi bhṛśaṃ patito 'smi pāde % dāsas tava priyatame bhaja maṃ smarāmi // BiCaup_36
GK19bicaupau:111: adyā7pi dhavati manaḥ kim ahaṃ karomi $ sārdhaṃ sakhībhir api vāsa-gṛhaṃ
GK19bicaupau:115: adyā7pi tāṃ jagati varṇayituṃ na kaś cic $ chaknoty adṛṣṭa-sadṛśīṃ ca parigrahaṃ me &
GK19bicaupau:116: dṛṣṭaṃ tayor sadṛśayor khalu yena rūpaṃ % śakto bhaved yadi sai7va naro na cā7nyaḥ // BiCaup_38
GK19bicaupau:117: adyā7pi tāṃ na khalu vedmi kim īśa-patnī $ śāpaṃ gatā sura-pater atha
GK19bicaupau:119: dhātrai9va kiṃ nu jagataḥ parimohanāya % sā nirmitā yuvati-ratna-didṛkṣayā
GK19bicaupau:123: paśye tavā8tmani navīna-payodharābhyāṃ % kṣīṇāṃ vapur yadi vinaśyati no na
GK19bicaupau:125: adyā7pi nirmala-śarac-chaśi-gaura-kānti $ ceto muner api haret kim utā7smadīyam &
GK19bicaupau:126: vaktraṃ sudhā-mayam ahaṃ yadi tat prapadye % cumban pibāmy avirataṃ
GK19bicaupau:130: prāpnomy ahaṃ yadi punaḥ suratai1ka-tīrthaṃ % prāṇāṃs tyajāmī niyataṃ
GK19bicaupau:133: anyābhir apy upamituṃ na mayā ca śakyaṃ % rūpaṃ tadīyam iti me hṛdaye vitarkaḥ // BiCaup_43
GK19bicaupau:143: gandharva-yakṣa-sura-kiṃnara-nāga-kanyāṃ % svargād aho nipatitām iva cintayāmi // BiCaup_45
GK19bicaupau:146: nānā-vicitra-kṛta-maṇḍa-maṇḍitā1ṅgī % supto1tthitāṃ niśi divā na hi vismarāmi // BiCaup_46
GK19bicaupau:147: adyā7pi tāṃ kanaka-kānti-madālasā1ṅgīṃ $ vrīḍo2tsukāṃ nipatitām iva ceṣṭamānām &
GK19bicaupau:148: agāṃga-saṃga-paricumbana-jāta-mohāṃ % tāṃ jīvanau1ṣadhim iva pramadāṃ smarāmi // BiCaup_47
GK19bicaupau:150: dantau1ṣṭha-pīḍana-nakha-kṣata-rakta-siktaṃ % tasyā smarāmi rati-bandhura-niṣṭhuratvam adyā7py ahaṃ vara-vadhū-surato1pabhogaṃ $ jīvāmi nā7nya-vidhinā kṣaṇam antareṇa &
GK19bicaupau:151: tad bhrātaro maraṇam eva hi duḥkha % śāntyai vijñāpayāmi bhavatas tvaritaṃ lunīdhvam // BiCaup_49
GK19bicaupau:152: adyā7pi no7jjhati haraḥ kila kāla-kūṭaṃ $ kūrmo bibharti dharaṇīṃ khalu
GK19bicaupau:154: ambhonidhir vahati duḥsaha-vaḍavā2gnim % aṅgī-kṛtaṃ sukṛtinaḥ paripālayanti // BiCaup_50 //
